title: Antigravity vs 3DF Zephyr: Which AI Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Antigravity vs 3DF Zephyr. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Antigravity and 3DF Zephyr? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Antigravity vs 3DF Zephyr
paragraphs: Antigravity (developer tools) is Antigravity is a revolutionary multi-agent AI code editor that debuted at #1 in December 2026 developer rankings. Completely free during preview, it features unique multi-agent orchestration where multiple AI agents collaborate on complex coding tasks, integrated Chrome browser automation for testing, and support for the latest models (Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Sonnet 4.5/Opus 4.5). Its key differentiator is multi-agent collaboration—a capability no competitor offers—enabling it to tackle complex projects autonomously.. It's known for code-editor, ai-agents, multi-agent.

3DF Zephyr (computer vision) is 3DF Zephyr is a professional-grade photogrammetry software that automatically reconstructs highly detailed 3D models and scenes from standard photographs. It is designed for professionals in fields like cultural heritage, surveying, and visual effects, offering comprehensive workflows from point cloud generation to textured mesh creation and measurements. Its key differentiator is a powerful, user-friendly pipeline that balances advanced automation with extensive manual editing and export tools, all accelerated by multi-GPU support.. Users choose it for photogrammetry, 3d-reconstruction, point-cloud.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Antigravity: Multi-agent orchestration (unique feature), Integrated Chrome browser automation, Live preview and design-to-code
3DF Zephyr: Automatic 3D reconstruction from unordered photos (aerial & terrestrial), Multi-GPU CUDA/OpenCL acceleration for processing, Dense point cloud generation and mesh editing tools

verdict: Both Antigravity and 3DF Zephyr are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Antigravity for code-editor, 3DF Zephyr for photogrammetry.
